participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

WWT_WalkTime1.Description: First trial of single task walking time in seconds

WWT_WalkTime2.Description: Second trial of single task walking time in seconds

WWT_DTTime1.Description: First trial of dual task walking time in seconds (secondary task reciting alternate alphabet)

WWT_DTTime2.Description: Second trial of dual task walking time in seconds (secondary task reciting alternate alphabet)

WWT_DThits1.Description: total number of letters recited correctly during dual task first trial

WWT_DThits2.Description: total number of letters recited correctly during dual task second trial

WWT_DTerr1.Description: total number of errors on letters during dual task first trial

WWT_DTerr2.Description: total number of errors on letters during dual task first trial

WWT_SThits1.Description: total number of letters recited correctly during SINGLE task first trial

WWT_SThits2.Description: total number of letters recited correctly during SINGLE task second trial

WWT_STerr1.Description: total number of errors on letters during SINGLE task first trial

WWT_STerr2.Description: total number of errors on letters during SINGLE task second trial
